titles.title: A resolution to authorize the testimony of Senate employees.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Authorizes Kenneth A. McLean, and any other present or former Senate employee whose testimony may be required, to testify in the trial of United States v. Deborah Dean, except concerning matters for which a privilege may be asserted. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent such individuals in connection with such testimony.
